headerText: Hindsyght operates Hindsyght.com and may operate other websites. It is Hindsyght’s policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect while operating our websites. Our mission is to connect companies to professional services companies allowing them to forge successful partnerships.

section1.body:
Like most website operators, Hindsyght collects non-personally-identifying information of the sort that web browsers and servers typically make available, such as the browser type, language preference, referring site, and the date and time of each visitor request. Hindsyght’s purpose in collecting non-personally identifying information is to better understand how Hindsyght’s visitors use its website. From time to time, Hindsyght may release non-personally-identifying information in the aggregate, e.g., by publishing a report on trends in the usage of its website.

Hindsyght also collects potentially personally-identifying information like Internet Protocol (IP) addresses for logged in users and for users leaving comments on Hindsyght.com blogs/sites. Hindsyght only discloses logged in user and commenter IP addresses under the same circumstances that it uses and discloses personally-identifying information as described below, except that commenter IP addresses and email addresses are visible and disclosed to the administrators of the blog/site where the comment was left.

section2.body: Certain visitors to Hindsyght’s websites choose to interact with Hindsyght in ways that require Hindsyght to gather personally-identifying information. The amount and type of information that Hindsyght gathers depends on the nature of the interaction. For example, we ask visitors who sign up at Hindsyght.com to provide a username, email address, company they work for, etc. Those who engage in transactions with Hindsyght are asked to provide additional information, including as necessary the personal and financial information required to process those transactions. In each case, Hindsyght collects such information only insofar as is necessary or appropriate to fulfill the purpose of the visitor’s interaction with Hindsyght. Hindsyght does not disclose personally-identifying information other than as described below. And visitors can always refuse to supply personally-identifying information, with the caveat that it may prevent them from engaging in certain website-related activities.

section3.body: Hindsyght may collect statistics about the behavior of visitors to its websites. Hindsyght may display this information publicly or provide it to others. However, Hindsyght does not disclose personally-identifying information other than as described below.

section4.body:
Our Services allow you to connect with other users and companies in our platform to collaborate and search for potential partners, clients, and connections. We will use your data (such as your profile, searches your made, companies you have viewed) to help connect you with other professionals or companies in our platform. Our Services allow you to communicate with other Members and schedule and prepare meetings with them. We may suggest companies for you to view, or suggest companies that fit your search criteria to contact you. You can also opt-in to allow us to use your precise location or proximity for accurate searches within your area. We use the data we have about you to recommend relevant content and industry news. We may notify others that you have updated your profile.

We may contact you through email, mobile phone, notices posted on our websites or apps, and other ways through our Services, including text messages and push notifications. We will send you messages about the availability of our Services, security, or other service-related issues. We also send promotional messages from us and our partners. You may change your communication preferences anytime.  Please be aware that you cannot opt-out of receiving service messages from us, including security and legal notices.

section5.body:
We use data and content about Members to invite and promote membership to help grow our community.  The growth of our network will help with user engagement and help drive more services.

Ads appearing on any of our websites may be delivered to users by advertising partners, who may set cookies. These cookies allow the ad server to recognize your computer each time they send you an online advertisement to compile information about you or others who use your computer. This information allows ad networks to, among other things, deliver targeted advertisements that they believe will be of most interest to you. This Privacy Policy covers the use of cookies by Hindsyght and does not cover the use of cookies by any advertisers.

We target and measure performance of ads to members and visitors of our site. We will show you ads from sponsored content which may look similar to non-sponsored content, except that they are labeled “ads” or “sponsored.” If you click on these ads, your profile will be viewable by others, including the advertiser.

section6.body: We may use your data to conduct research and development in order to improve our Services and provide our members and visitors with a better, more intuitive and personalized experience.  We may send out polls and surveys to better understand how we can improve our services. You are not obligated to respond to polls or surveys, and you have choices about the information you provide.  We also use your data to investigate, respond to, and resolve complaints regarding our services.

section7.body: Hindsyght discloses potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information only to those of its employees, contractors and affiliated organizations that (i) need to know that information in order to process it on Hindsyght’s behalf or to provide services available at Hindsyght’s websites, and (ii) that have agreed not to disclose it to others. Some of those employees, contractors and affiliated organizations may be located outside of your home country; by using Hindsyght’s websites, you consent to the transfer of such information to them. Other than to its employees, contractors and affiliated organizations, as described above, Hindsyght may disclose potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information as required by law, such as in response to a subpoena, court order or other governmental request, or when Hindsyght believes in good faith that disclosure is reasonably necessary to protect the property or rights of Hindsyght, third parties or the public at large. If you are a registered user of Hindsyght website and have supplied your email address, Hindsyght may occasionally send you an email to tell you about new features, solicit your feedback, or just keep you up to date with what’s going on with Hindsyght and our products. If you send us a request (for example via email or via one of our feedback mechanisms), we reserve the right to publish it in order to help us clarify or respond to your request or to help us support other users. Hindsyght takes all measures reasonably necessary to protect against the unauthorized access, use, alteration or destruction of potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information.

section8.body:
The security of your Personal Information is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

We may use your data if we think it’s necessary for security purposes or to investigate possible fraud or other violations of our Terms of Use or this Privacy Policy.

section9.body: A cookie is a string of information that a website stores on a visitor’s computer, and that the visitor’s browser provides to the website each time the visitor returns. Hindsyght uses cookies to help Hindsyght identify and track visitors, their usage of Hindsyght website, and their website access preferences. Hindsyght visitors who do not wish to have cookies placed on their computers should set their browsers to refuse cookies before using Hindsyght’s websites, with the drawback that certain features of Hindsyght’s websites may not function properly without the aid of cookies.

section10.body: If Hindsyght, or substantially all of its assets, were acquired, or in the unlikely event that Hindsyght goes out of business or enters bankruptcy, user information would be one of the assets that is transferred or acquired by a third party. You acknowledge that such transfers may occur, and that any acquirer of Hindsyght may continue to use your personal information as set forth in this policy.

section11.body: Although most changes are likely to be minor, Hindsyght may change its Privacy Policy from time to time, and in Hindsyght’s sole discretion. Hindsyght encourages visitors to frequently check this page for any changes to its Privacy Policy. If you have a Hindsyght.com account, you might also receive an alert informing you of these changes. Your continued use of this site after any change in this Privacy Policy will constitute your acceptance of such change.
